title: Hour 2 - Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Hosting
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Hosting
description:
With Doug and TJ filling in for Dan.  On the 12th anniversary of "The Decision" by Lebron James, Doug and TJ talk about what they remember most about that TV event and the fallout from it. Former NF team executive Andrew Brandt joins Doug and TJ to talk about the Baker Mayfield deal, Cam Newton and what happens with Deshaun Watson.  TJ played college ball in the Pac12, and he discusses with Doug the recent news about the Pac12 losing their two highest profile schools to the Big 10.

#DougGottliebShow #UpOnGame

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
